li.p:
(a)
If the contract is fully funded, funds are obligated to cover the price or target price of a fixed-price contract or the estimated cost and any fee of a cost-reimbursement contract.

(b)
If the contract is incrementally funded, funds are obligated to cover the amount allotted and any corresponding increment of fee.
